page.title: 03EDUCATION.INFANTS CLASS.
page.content: In our infant class only two children live near enough to walk home from school. Two people live a little further and go home by car. The others go home by taxi. Only two people live in a bungalow. The rest live in houses. One person's bungalow is near the main road, but the rest live at the top of a lane. Nine of us have jobs to do when we get home. These include feeding ponies, hens, ducks and pets, collecting eggs, bringing in logs,milking a cow and feeding a ferret.Everybody likes outside play best on our bikes.Our favourite T.V shows are Dynasty and Dallas.Sarah listens to her story tapes.Most of us go to bed between 7pm and 8pm.Seven of us have our own bedroom and the rest share a room with one other person.Nine of us have a bedtime story.
